mapper.select: select a.name,b.guest_num,b.content,b.secret,date_format(b.regdate,'%Y/%c/%e') as regdate from member as a join guestbook as b on a.id=b.id order by b.guest_num desc
mapper.update: update guestbook set secret=#{value} where guest_num=#{guest_num}
update guestbook set content=#{content},secret=#{secret} where guest_num=#{guest_num}
